alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; Henry (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 10:58PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Fayette, southwestern Henry and central Clayton Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1057 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Jw Smith Reservoir, or near Fayetteville, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Riverdale, Hampton, Tyrone, Morrow, Lovejoy, Locust Grove, Lake Spivey, Blacksville, Inman, Bonanza, Atlanta Motor Speedway, Jw Smith Reservoir, Flippen, Sandy Creek and Eagles Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
